articles.title: Emmanuel Macron party loses majority with 245 seats in French parliament: Ministry - Times of India

articles.title: NATO chief warns Ukraine war could last years, says world must not let up support - ABC News
articles.description: Jens Stoltenberg says supplying state-of-the-art weaponry to Ukrainian troops will boost the chance of freeing the country's east, as Britain's new army chief warns troops the UK must be ready to fight wars in Europe.
articles.content:

articles.title: Air India to look at new airplanes under the Tatas, says Airbus CCO - Economic Times

Air India is reorganising itself under the Tata group and will look at refurbishing its fleet with new aircraft, said a senior executive at Airbus on Sunday.
